an8.119:1.3: Ajjhattam rupasanni bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani,
an8.119:1.5: Ajjhattam rupasanni bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani, tani abhibhuyya ‘janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
an8.119:1.6: Ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani, tani abhibhuyya ‘janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
an8.119:1.7: Ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani, tani abhibhuyya ‘janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
an8.119:1.8: Ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani
an8.119:1.13: ragassa, bhikkhave, abhinnaya ime attha dhamma bhavetabba”.
